attributes.action: Change school rules so all students can wear retainer  in all uk schools
attributes.additional_details: My daughter suffers from constant infection as she has to constantly take her piecing out and in for school I have also had to remove my child from school due to her piecing needing to stay in for 3 weeks because the school have said she can’t have it in at school and she can’t remove it I was also informed she can’t wear retainer even though these are aloud in most work places
attributes.background: We would like older children to be able to wear retainer while at school my daughter has two ear piercing and a nose piercing and she’s being told to only wear one set of metal coloured studs in the lower lobe

rejection.details: It isn't clear whether you want rules to change to enable children to wear retainers, or to enable them to wear jewellery. It's also a school's individual responsibility to decide what uniform the children can wear, rather than the Government's or Parliament's.
